amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-217 to authorize the Secretary of Defense to use Defense Health Program funds for testing ticks for tick-borne diseases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Keating.
